structure.unit: ARTICLE VIIA. MOTOR VEHICLE REPAIR ORDINANCE

law.catch_line: Adoption by reference of portions of Florida Motor Vehicle Repair Act.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-161.10. Adoption by reference of portions of Florida Motor Vehicle Repair Act.
Section 559.905, Florida Statutes, through Section 559.919, except Section 559.915 relating to records retention, Florida Statutes, as same may be amended from time to time, are adopted hereby and incorporated herein by reference thereto as if the provisions of each such statutes were set out in full herein and each violation of said statutes is a violation of this article.
